## Background

I'm an entrepreneurial management student at Brigham Young University with a passion for building innovative products and creating sustainable wealth through strategic investments. My journey combines academic excellence with hands-on business experience, as I actively co-manage a multifamily investment firm while pursuing my degree.

What drives my passion for product management is the intersection of technology, user experience, and business strategy. I believe great products solve real problems while creating meaningful value for users and stakeholders alike.
